sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:title: BBa_K2180016
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Promoter + Cadmium Operator - MntR Binding Site + Blue Pigment + Terminator
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableProvenance: This part conisist of the change of the lactose's operator by the CzrA operator ( BBa_K2180001 ) in the biobrick BBa_K2180012
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableDescription: This part conisist of the change of the lactose's operator by the CzrA operator ( BBa_K2180001 ) in the biobrick BBa_K2180012
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableNotes: This part conisist of the change of the lactose's operator by the CzrA operator ( BBa_K2180001 ) in the biobrick BBa_K2180012
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dc:creator: Wilhelm Vaysse-Zinkh??fer

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:title: BBa_K2180008
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableDescription: This is a double terminator we use in our project for the pigment production. He is made of a transcriptional terminator in forward and reverse direction. There is a BmtI restriction site before the first terminator (forward) and an AvrII restriction site after the second terminator (reverse).
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dc:creator: Sofiane Safi-Stibler

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:title: BBa_K2180005
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Pigment Blue for B. subtilis with a LVA tail and restriction site (Blue Pigment)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableProvenance: This part come from a previous IGEM part (add part)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableDescription: This sequence is coding for a blue pigment we use in our detection system as a reporter.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableNotes: We had to improve the codon usage for B. subtilis
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dc:creator: Sofiane Safi-Stibler

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:title: BBa_K2180006
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: PLacO - Promoter LacO for B. subtilis
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableProvenance: The part is made of a previous IGEM part (add part)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableDescription: This part is made of PlepA promoter, two LacI binding sites and a RBS. There is a PacI restriction site before LacI binding sites and a SacII restriction site after them. They allows us to remplace the LacI binding sites by another operating sequence. A SalI restriction sites is presents before the PlepA sequence that may be used to insert the whole sequence. We use this part in our project to promote the pigment expression under the control of LacI.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dc:creator: Sofiane Safi-Stibler

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:title: BBa_K2180010
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableProvenance: This part is based on a previous part from the Cornell 2009 Team (2009/08/10) : http://parts.igem.org/Part:BBa_K285103:Design
sbol:ComponentDefinition.sbh:mutableDescription: We add two restriction sites. SacII before and PacI after the regulatory region in order to use it in our project. They allow us to replace a regulatory region with another regulatory region. This Region allow MntR to bind and repress transcription. In the presence of Cadmium
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dc:creator: Sofiane Safi-Stibler

prov:Activity.dcterms:title: iGEM to SBOL conversion
prov:Activity.dcterms:description: Conversion of the iGEM parts registry to SBOL2.1

Chris J. Myers
